bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Ivan Greenberg is an historian and the author of The Dangers of Dissent: The FBI and Civil Liberties Since 1965 (Lexington Books, 2010).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains FBI files obtained under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) by Ivan Greenberg on: the Socialist Scholars Conference, the Socialist Workers Party, Dissent magazine, the Institute for Policy Studies (box 1); and Gus Hall (box 2).
